column4: i have a silly amd at 400-something and gnome works better overall than kde
but not a fan of either, to be honest
i was running dvd shrink with wine the other day and it ran better than win xp
in gnome... that's what i'm interested in :)
so can anyone help me with my disappeared desktop icon?
ah.. Xappe... we have the same problem :)
ah, I see. haven't really thought about it, but it came to my mind when they suddenly showed up...
i partially upgraded from warty to hoary; that's when it stopped showing up: on the desktop on places, everywhere
i'm installing the latest nautilus just in case
i've never used warty. upgraded to hoary right away in november, and now i have a fresh install from array 7
fresh and daily updated that is
hi
bullshit.
no luck?
no luck at all :(
how does nautilus know which drives to show?
it should show things mounted in /media
the ones that are shown are my cdrom & floppy which are cdrom0 and floppy0 which link back to cdrom and floppy
my windows drive is in media :(
so are my mounted partitions, and they do not show up in Places either
daaaamn :(
